DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : To evaluate , consider expectant management tubal ectopic pregnancy complementary use Methotrexate could provide good result . We evaluate success treatment time require titer β-hCG become negative . Methods : A double-blind randomized study , hold Department Obstetrics UNIFESP . The patient divide two group : one patient administer single intramuscular dose 50 mg/m2 Methotrexate patient prescribe Placebo intramuscularly . The monitoring do measurement β-hCG 4th 7th day . When decline beta-hCG titer > 15 % interval , patient follow weekly dose β-hCG titer become negative . The criterion success β-hCG negative . The treatment failure occur surgery necessary .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Of Expectant Management In The Tubal Ectopic Pregnancy
DOC.criteria: Hemodynamic stability Initial βhCG < 2000 mIU / mL Titers βhCG decline 48 hour treatment Adnexal mass < 5.0 cm Desire future pregnancy Alive embryo Ectopic pregnancy tubal location Pregnancy unknown location
